stepItems.title: Send email
stepItems.subject: {{ job.title }} job received
stepItems.body:
{% assign split_name = recipient.name | split: ' ' %} Hi {{ split_name.first }} We've received your {{ job.title }} job. {{ steps.first.title }} title What happens now?
  • If you haven't already, grant our fixer access to your website admin
  • Typically your fixes will take two weeks to be completely wrapped up
  • For the fastest response to any questions log in to Blimpon, go to the job and send a message there
  • Once we're finished you'll receive a message detailing everything we've done
